name: ABS
description: Returns the absolute value of a number

name: ACOS
description: Returns the arccosine, or inverse cosine, of a number

name: ACOSH
description: Returns the inverse hyperbolic cosine of a number

name: ACOT
description: Returns the arccotangent, or inverse cotangent, of a number

name: ACOTH
description: Returns the inverse hyperbolic cotangent of a number

name: ADDCOLUMNS
description: Adds calculated columns to the given table or table expression

name: ADDMISSINGITEMS
description: Adds rows with empty values to a table returned by SUMMARIZECOLUMNS

name: ALL
description: Returns all the rows in a table, or all the values in a column, ignoring any filters that might have been applied

name: ALLCROSSFILTERED
description: Clear all filters which are applied to a table

name: ALLEXCEPT
description: Removes all context filters in the table except filters that are applied to the specified columns

name: ALLNOBLANKROW
description: Returns all rows except blank rows from a table, or all values from a column ignoring filters

name: ALLSELECTED
description: Removes context filters from columns and rows in the current query, while retaining all other context filters or explicit filters

name: AND
description: Checks whether both arguments are TRUE, and returns TRUE if both arguments are TRUE

name: APPROXIMATEDISTINCTCOUNT
description: Returns the approximate number of distinct values in a column

name: ASIN
description: Returns the arcsine, or inverse sine, of a number

name: ASINH
description: Returns the inverse hyperbolic sine of a number

name: ATAN
description: Returns the arctangent, or inverse tangent, of a number

name: ATANH
description: Returns the inverse hyperbolic tangent of a number

name: AVERAGE
description: Returns the average (arithmetic mean) of all the numbers in a column

name: AVERAGEA
description: Returns the average (arithmetic mean) of the values in a column, handles text and non-numeric values

name: AVERAGEX
description: Calculates the average (arithmetic mean) of a set of expressions evaluated over a table

name: BLANK
description: Returns a blank value

name: CALCULATE
description: Evaluates an expression in a context modified by filters

name: CALCULATETABLE
description: Evaluates a table expression in a context modified by filters

name: CALENDAR
description: Returns a table with a single column of dates from a specified start date to end date

name: CALENDARAUTO
description: Returns a table with a single column of dates calculated automatically from the model

name: CEILING
description: Rounds a number up, to the nearest integer or nearest multiple of significance

name: COALESCE
description: Returns the first expression that does not evaluate to BLANK

name: COMBINEVALUES
description: Joins two or more text strings into one text string with a specified delimiter

name: CONCATENATE
description: Joins two text strings into one text string

name: CONCATENATEX
description: Concatenates strings from multiple rows with an optional delimiter

name: CONTAINS
description: Returns TRUE if values for all referred columns exist in those columns

name: CONTAINSROW
description: Returns TRUE if a row of values exists or contained in a table

name: CONTAINSSTRING
description: Returns TRUE if a specified string is found within a column

name: COUNT
description: Counts the number of cells in a column that contain numbers

name: COUNTA
description: Counts the number of cells in a column that are not empty

name: COUNTAX
description: Counts non-blank results when evaluating the result of an expression over a table

name: COUNTBLANK
description: Counts the number of blank cells in a column

name: COUNTROWS
description: Counts the number of rows in the specified table or table expression

name: COUNTX
description: Counts the number of rows that contain a non-blank value or expression

name: CROSSFILTER
description: Specifies the cross-filtering direction to be used in a calculation

name: CROSSJOIN
description: Returns a table that contains the Cartesian product of all rows from all tables

name: CURRENCY
description: Evaluates the argument and returns the result as currency data type

name: CURRENTGROUP
description: Returns the current group in a GROUPBY or SUMMARIZE expression

name: CUSTOMDATA
description: Returns the CustomData string stored in the connection string

name: DATATABLE
description: Returns a table with data defined inline

name: DATE
description: Returns the specified date in datetime format

name: DATEADD
description: Returns a table with dates shifted by the specified number of intervals

name: DATEDIFF
description: Returns the count of interval boundaries crossed between two dates

name: DATESBETWEEN
description: Returns a table with dates between the specified start date and end date

name: DATESINPERIOD
description: Returns a table with dates in the period specified

name: DATESMTD
description: Returns a table with dates for the month to date

name: DATESQTD
description: Returns a table with dates for the quarter to date

name: DATESYTD
description: Returns a table with dates for the year to date

name: DATEVALUE
description: Converts a date in text format to a date in datetime format

name: DAY
description: Returns the day of the month, a number from 1 to 31

name: DISTINCT
description: Returns a one column table with distinct values from the specified column

name: DISTINCTCOUNT
description: Counts the number of distinct values in a column

name: DIVIDE
description: Performs division and returns an alternate result or BLANK on division by zero

name: EARLIER
description: Returns the current value of the specified column in an outer evaluation pass

name: EARLIEST
description: Returns the current value of the specified column in the outermost evaluation pass

name: EDATE
description: Returns the date that is the indicated number of months before or after the start date

name: ENDOFMONTH
description: Returns the last date of the month in the current context

name: ENDOFQUARTER
description: Returns the last date of the quarter in the current context

name: ENDOFYEAR
description: Returns the last date of the year in the current context

name: EOMONTH
description: Returns the date in datetime format of the last day of the month

name: ERROR
description: Raises an error with an error message

name: EXACT
description: Compares two text strings and returns TRUE if they are exactly the same

name: EXCEPT
description: Returns the rows of one table which do not appear in another table

name: EXP
description: Returns e raised to the power of a given number

name: FACT
description: Returns the factorial of a number

name: FALSE
description: Returns the logical value FALSE

name: FILTER
description: Returns a table that has been filtered

name: FILTERS
description: Returns the values that are directly applied as filters

name: FIND
description: Returns the starting position of one text string within another (case-sensitive)

name: FIRSTDATE
description: Returns the first date in the current context

name: FIRSTNONBLANK
description: Returns the first value in the column for which the expression has a non-blank value

name: FIRSTNONBLANKVALUE
description: Returns the first non-blank value of the expression evaluated for each row

name: FIXED
description: Rounds a number to the specified number of decimals and returns the result as text

name: FLOOR
description: Rounds a number down, toward zero, to the nearest multiple of significance

name: FORMAT
description: Converts a value to text according to the specified format

name: GENERATE
description: Returns a table with the Cartesian product of all rows from the first table, evaluating the second table for each row

name: GENERATEALL
description: Returns a table with the Cartesian product including rows for which the second table expression is empty

name: GENERATESERIES
description: Returns a single column table with a series of numbers

name: GROUPBY
description: Groups rows and applies aggregate expressions without row context transitions

name: HASONEFILTER
description: Returns TRUE when the number of directly filtered values on columnName is one

name: HASONEVALUE
description: Returns TRUE when there is only one value in the specified column

name: HOUR
description: Returns the hour as a number from 0 to 23

name: IF
description: Checks if a condition is met, and returns one value if TRUE and another if FALSE

name: IFERROR
description: Returns value_if_error if the first expression is an error, otherwise returns the expression itself

name: IGNORE
description: Modifies SUMMARIZECOLUMNS to omit specific expressions from the BLANK/NULL evaluation

name: INT
description: Rounds a number down to the nearest integer

name: INTERSECT
description: Returns the rows that appear in both tables

name: ISBLANK
description: Checks whether a value is blank, and returns TRUE or FALSE

name: ISCROSSFILTERED
description: Returns TRUE when columnName or another column in the same or related table is being filtered

name: ISEMPTY
description: Checks if a table is empty

name: ISERROR
description: Checks whether a value is an error, and returns TRUE or FALSE

name: ISEVEN
description: Returns TRUE if the number is even

name: ISFILTERED
description: Returns TRUE when columnName is being filtered directly

name: ISINSCOPE
description: Returns TRUE when the specified column is in the filter context

name: ISLOGICAL
description: Checks whether a value is a logical value, and returns TRUE or FALSE

name: ISNONTEXT
description: Checks whether a value is not text, and returns TRUE or FALSE

name: ISNUMBER
description: Checks whether a value is a number, and returns TRUE or FALSE

name: ISODD
description: Returns TRUE if the number is odd

name: ISTEXT
description: Checks whether a value is text, and returns TRUE or FALSE

name: KEEPFILTERS
description: Modifies how filters are applied while evaluating a CALCULATE or CALCULATETABLE function

name: LASTDATE
description: Returns the last date in the current context

name: LASTNONBLANK
description: Returns the last value in the column for which the expression has a non-blank value

name: LASTNONBLANKVALUE
description: Returns the last non-blank value of the expression evaluated for each row

name: LEFT
description: Returns the specified number of characters from the start of a text string

name: LEN
description: Returns the number of characters in a text string

name: LN
description: Returns the natural logarithm of a number

name: LOG
description: Returns the logarithm of a number to the base you specify

name: LOG10
description: Returns the base-10 logarithm of a number

name: LOOKUPVALUE
description: Returns the value for the row that meets all criteria specified by search conditions

name: LOWER
description: Converts a text string to all lowercase letters

name: MAX
description: Returns the largest value in a column

name: MAXA
description: Returns the largest value in a column, including logical values and text

name: MAXX
description: Returns the largest value from the result of an expression evaluated for each row in a table

name: MEDIAN
description: Returns the median of numbers in a column

name: MEDIANX
description: Returns the median value of an expression evaluated for each row in a table

name: MID
description: Returns a string of characters from the middle of a text string

name: MIN
description: Returns the smallest value in a column

name: MINA
description: Returns the smallest value in a column, including logical values and text

name: MINUTE
description: Returns the minute as a number from 0 to 59

name: MINX
description: Returns the smallest value from the result of an expression evaluated for each row in a table

name: MOD
description: Returns the remainder after a number is divided by a divisor

name: MONTH
description: Returns the month as a number from 1 to 12

name: NATURALINNERJOIN
description: Performs an inner join of two tables

name: NATURALLEFTOUTERJOIN
description: Performs a left outer join of two tables

name: NEXTDAY
description: Returns a table with dates from the next day

name: NEXTMONTH
description: Returns a table with dates from the next month

name: NEXTQUARTER
description: Returns a table with dates from the next quarter

name: NEXTYEAR
description: Returns a table with dates from the next year

name: NOT
description: Changes FALSE to TRUE, or TRUE to FALSE

name: NOW
description: Returns the current date and time in datetime format

name: OR
description: Checks whether one of the arguments is TRUE to return TRUE

name: PARALLELPERIOD
description: Returns a table with dates from a parallel period

name: PATH
description: Returns a delimited text string with the identifiers of all parents

name: PATHCONTAINS
description: Returns TRUE if the specified item is present in the path

name: PATHITEM
description: Returns the item at the specified position from a path

name: PATHITEMREVERSE
description: Returns the item at the specified position from a path, counting backwards

name: PATHLENGTH
description: Returns the number of items in a path

name: POWER
description: Returns the result of a number raised to a power

name: PREVIOUSDAY
description: Returns a table with dates from the previous day

name: PREVIOUSMONTH
description: Returns a table with dates from the previous month

name: PREVIOUSQUARTER
description: Returns a table with dates from the previous quarter

name: PREVIOUSYEAR
description: Returns a table with dates from the previous year

name: PRODUCT
description: Returns the product of the numbers in a column

name: PRODUCTX
description: Returns the product of an expression evaluated for each row in a table

name: QUARTER
description: Returns the quarter as a number from 1 to 4

name: QUOTIENT
description: Performs division and returns only the integer portion of the division result

name: RADIANS
description: Converts degrees to radians

name: RAND
description: Returns a random number greater than or equal to 0 and less than 1

name: RANDBETWEEN
description: Returns a random number in the range you specify

name: RANKX
description: Returns the ranking of a number in a list of numbers for each row in the table argument

name: RELATED
description: Returns a related value from another table

name: RELATEDTABLE
description: Returns all related rows from a specified table

name: REMOVEFILTERS
description: Clears filters from the specified tables or columns

name: REPLACE
description: Replaces part of a text string with a different text string

name: REPT
description: Repeats text a given number of times

name: RIGHT
description: Returns the specified number of characters from the end of a text string

name: ROUND
description: Rounds a number to the specified number of digits

name: ROUNDDOWN
description: Rounds a number down, toward zero

name: ROUNDUP
description: Rounds a number up, away from zero

name: ROW
description: Returns a single row table with new columns specified by the expressions

name: SAMEPERIODLASTYEAR
description: Returns a table with dates from the same period in the previous year

name: SEARCH
description: Returns the number of the character at which a specific character or text string is first found (case-insensitive)

name: SECOND
description: Returns the seconds of a time value as a number from 0 to 59

name: SELECTCOLUMNS
description: Adds calculated columns to a table and returns a table with only those columns

name: SELECTEDVALUE
description: Returns the value when there's only one value in the specified column, otherwise returns the alternate result

name: SIGN
description: Returns the sign of a number: 1 if positive, -1 if negative, 0 if zero

name: SIN
description: Returns the sine of the given angle

name: SQRT
description: Returns the square root of a number

name: STARTOFMONTH
description: Returns the first date of the month in the current context

name: STARTOFQUARTER
description: Returns the first date of the quarter in the current context

name: STARTOFYEAR
description: Returns the first date of the year in the current context

name: SUBSTITUTE
description: Replaces existing text with new text in a text string

name: SUM
description: Adds all the numbers in a column

name: SUMMARIZE
description: Groups rows and creates summary rows based on specified columns

name: SUMMARIZECOLUMNS
description: Creates a summary table based on specified columns and expressions

name: SUMX
description: Returns the sum of an expression evaluated for each row in a table

name: SWITCH
description: Evaluates an expression against a list of values and returns one of multiple possible result expressions

name: TIME
description: Converts hours, minutes, and seconds given as numbers to a time

name: TIMEVALUE
description: Converts a time in text format to a time in datetime format

name: TODAY
description: Returns the current date

name: TOPN
description: Returns the top N rows of the specified table

name: TOTALMTD
description: Evaluates an expression for the dates in the month to date

name: TOTALQTD
description: Evaluates an expression for the dates in the quarter to date

name: TOTALYTD
description: Evaluates an expression for the dates in the year to date

name: TREATAS
description: Applies the result of a table expression as filters to columns from an unrelated table

name: TRIM
description: Removes all spaces from text except for single spaces between words

name: TRUE
description: Returns the logical value TRUE

name: TRUNC
description: Truncates a number to an integer by removing the decimal part

name: UNION
description: Returns the union of the tables whose columns match

name: UPPER
description: Converts a text string to all uppercase letters

name: USERELATIONSHIP
description: Specifies an inactive relationship to be used in a CALCULATE expression

name: USERNAME
description: Returns the domain name and username of the current connection

name: USERPRINCIPALNAME
description: Returns the user principal name of the current user

name: UTCNOW
description: Returns the current UTC date and time

name: UTCTODAY
description: Returns the current UTC date

name: VALUE
description: Converts a text string that represents a number to a number

name: VALUES
description: Returns a one-column table with distinct values from the specified column

name: VAR.P
description: Returns the variance of the entire population

name: VAR.S
description: Returns the variance of a sample population

name: VARX.P
description: Returns the variance of the entire population based on the entire population

name: VARX.S
description: Returns the variance of a sample population

name: WEEKDAY
description: Returns a number from 1 to 7 identifying the day of the week

name: WEEKNUM
description: Returns the week number in the year

name: YEAR
description: Returns the year as a four-digit integer

name: YEARFRAC
description: Calculates the fraction of the year represented by the number of whole days between two dates
